Stem: Smooth greyish bark, turning scaly, reddish and flaky with age.
Leaves: Large dark or bluish green 7-30 cm long with paler underside. Leathery  and with 3-5 deep lobes. Shed in autumn after turning yellow or brownish.
Flowers: Inconspicuous yellow or greenish and small, in drooping clusters.
FruitSeeds: Distinctive v-shaped with prominent wings. Reddish or green maturing to brown.
Habitat: Old gardens, riparian areas, wet forests, wastelands.
